content: Guarantee nothing happens to your pricey smartphone while you’re out adventuring by placing it inside the Pelican Go G40 case. This IP67 rated case features a heavy duty abrasion and impact-proof ABS outer shell that’s also dustproof and waterproof up to 1.5 meters.

titleEN: Fallout T-51 Power Armor USB Hub
content: Keep your electronic devices powered up like a true Wastelander by plugging them into this Fallout T-51 power armor USB hub. Designed like a highly detailed T-51 with a Sugar Bombs paint job, this pint-sized action figure is actually a handy USB hub with 4 ports.
Get name brand high quality knives such as Kershaw, SOG, CRKT, SPYDER CO, BUCK delivered direct to your doorstep each and every month that are yours to keep with the Monthly Knife Club!

McLaren has recently unveiled their newest luxury ride -the 600LT Spider convertible – and it it looks amazing! It boasts a revised twin-turbocharged 3.8-liter V8 along with a seven-speed gearbox that will let you do 0 to 60 in under 3 seconds and reach a top speed of 201 mph.

Root for your favorite team in utmost comfort by watching the big game sitting on this giant baseball glove armchair. The creative design of this massive leather glove makes it a perfect addition to any den, living room, or mancave.

Own The Elements – twelve unique wearable elements for the adventurous and the curious. Choose from Titanium, Tungsten, Copper, Gold and many more. Each bracelet is machined, assembled and personalized in the UK.

Meet adventure head-on while behind the wheel of this Jeep Wrangler Rubicon 6×6 SUV. This off-roading giant is powered by a supercharged 6.2-liter V8 and features a customized chassis built to accommodate 6 massive wheels and a pickup bed.

Don’t let “fear of labels” stop you from being romantic on Valentine’s Day. With the “It’s Complicated” Valentine’s Day card, you can show that special someone that you are thinking about them, but it’s totally not a big deal or anything. Whatever.

Explore the deep from the safety of land by setting this RoboShark underwater robot loose in the ocean. Measuring 6.5-feet long, this high-tech shark comes with a built-in obstacle avoidance system, can dive down nearly 1000 feet deep, and is able to swim at 10 knots.

Give new meaning to staying warm and toasty by snuggling up with this toast heated pillow. This ultra squishy and adorable little pillow can be easily charged via a USB cable and will remain warm for up to four hours making him the ideal for the winter months.

The Straprack is a home fitness gym that combines a full VKR and suspended strap training in one compact and foldable package that takes up zero floor space, won’t damage your door frame, and won’t ever fall off. Working out has never been this easy!

The underwater camping tent is going to revolutionize scuba diving. This underwater base camp will allow divers to dive deeper and longer by providing them a safe space to eat and rest without having to ascend all the way up to the surface.

titleEN: Dungeon In A Box RPG Subscription Box
content: Get serious about your D&D by gathering your posse around this Dungeon in a Box RPG subscription box. This geeky treasure chest comes packed with all sorts of goodies like a 24″ x 18″ battle map, monster tokens, a 24-page adventure book, and more!

Dinnerly is the meal plan service that provides delicious ingredients and tasty recipes for just $4.99 per person! You’ll receive a box stuffed with six ingredients of your choice so that you can conveniently whip up simple and tasty meals on a nightly basis.

Afloat is the modern waterbed for the new millennium. The bed’s water compartment is designed with a loose fit and is covered by a special stretch fabric and topped off with a soft memory foam cover that will conform to your body so that you sleep as snug as a newborn.

If you prefer retractable pens over a snap-cap pens this is the pen for you! You push down on the clip with your thumb and the middle button pops up with a satisfying click. To retract the pen, push on the middle button and it springs back up. How it works is a secret.

This futuristic spaceship home will make you feel like you’ve departed Earth and are aboard a ship hurtling through space. This remarkable abode is composed of 3 prefabricated modules placed 4 meters off the ground with an airplane staircase entrance.

Use your coffee breaks to ponder over the constant pain and suffering that is life by sipping your brew form this Mr. Meeseeks 3D mug. The neat three-dimensional design makes it look like you’re drinking your hot beverage straight out of Mr. Meeseeks’s head.

Moving around the sprawling golf course is easier and more fun than ever before when you hop aboard the CycleBoard golf scooter. This compact all-terrain ride can reach 14 mph and boasts a lean-to-steer system that makes piloting this scooter a breeze.

Indulge in a little Mary Jane without succumbing to her intoxicatingly groovy effects by sipping on Winabis – the cannabis flavored wine. It features a striking green hue and doesn’t contain any THC meaning you can drink it without fear of getting stoned, just really drunk.

titleEN: Full Scale Labyrinth Door Knocker Set
content: Pay homage to one of the best sci-fi flicks of all time by outfitting your home’s entrance with this imposing full scale Labyrinth door knocker set. These large and ornate door knockers where made using the actual screen-used props to ensure maximum authenticity.

The 1940s Belly Tank Lakester race car was built from a WWII-era aircraft drop tank and a Ford Model T frame. Apart from the unique and sci-fi-like exterior, this recently restored ride is powered by a V8-60 flathead with twin Stromberg 81 carburetors.

After a long absence, the iconic Motorola Razr is making a comeback! While details on this new and improved Motorola Razr smartphone are still scarce, it will sport a retro folding design and is rumored to hit the market sometime later this year.

Make your daily commute more efficient and entertaining than ever by transforming your plain shoes into roller skates using these custom clip-ons. They conveniently clip on to the soles of your sneakers so that you can skate all over your concrete jungle.

The Lamborghini Huracan Evo Coupe seamlessly blends performance, beauty, and technology. It boasts an updated exterior for improved aerodynamics and an 8.4” touchscreen system that lets you control the car and entertainment functions with your fingertips.

Instantly turn any deck into an electric skateboard using this bolt-on electric skateboard motor. This ultra light and compact powertrain kit is compatible with any type of deck and trunks and has a range of fifteen miles with a top speed of twenty-two miles per hour.

Spice up your love life by making yourself irresistible with these edible fragrances. These vegan-friendly fragrances are made with a combination of hand-picked fruit and flowers and are available in intoxicatingly delicious scents like ‘tropical and tempting watermelon”.

titleEN: Escape Vista Tiny Home On Wheels
content: Why settle down in just one place when you can have the world? This Escape Vista tiny home on wheels makes it possible to easily pick up and go from spot to spot without having to forfeit any of life’s modern conveniences or amenities.

With food waste accounting of 8% of global warming, cut down your carbon footprint by up-cycling your food waste with the smart insect farm. Now you’ll easily be able to turn your kitchen scraps and leftovers into fertilizer and mealworm protein.

Koenigsegg is taking the car world by storm with the unrivaled Naked Carbon Regera. This powerful 1500+ horsepower plug-in hybrid boasts a carbon fiber exterior with the epoxy coating painstakingly removed by hand and polished down to the raw carbon fiber.

The premier smoking accessory is available at last. The Omni comes with 8 tools, individually crafted from steel and aluminum: lever-action grinder, storage, hemp-wick, screens, scraper, poker, press, and mini lighter. A must-have for pipe smokers.

Cruising around your urban jungle is more efficient and fun than ever when you hop aboard the CycleBoard standup electric scooter. This three-wheeled scooter provides an incredibly smooth and eco-friendly ride powerful enough to take on the steepest of hills.

titleEN: Gourmet Bacon Of The Month Club
content: Show your favorite carnivore just how much you love them by signing them up for the gourmet bacon of the month club. After signing up for Bacon Scouts, you’ll receive a monthly care package containing two packs of mouth-watering premium bacon.

Give your glorious manly mane some added curb appeal by prettying it up with your very own beard bouquet. This quirky yet fabulous accessory contains nine small and vibrant red roses that you can clip on seamlessly to your beard.

Assemble your model of the future, today with this Fallout 76 Pip-Boy 2000 construction kit. Upon opening up the red metallic toolbox kit, you’ll find over 150 separate parts so that you can build your very own Pip-Boy 2000 like a true Wastelander.

BATHSPHERE is the glass sphere bathtub by Alexander Zhukovsky that aims to revolutionize the way you view a soak in the tub. It allows you to alter everything from temperature to humidity while the hanging spherical design creates a sense of weightlessness.

Tourbillon watches were once only for millionaires. Now, for the first time ever, Tourbillon watches are accessible to us all! Apart from the 100% Tourbillion movement, they feature a semi-exposed mechanism that allows you to partially to see the watch’s inner workings.

Make your mouth water by filling your home with the one and only aroma of the Colonel’s gravy by lighting up this KFC gravy scented candle. This unique candle was given out to the very lucky winner of a contest held by the famous chicken themed fast food chain.

Where do you see yourself in ten years? The Decade Planner is the totally unique calendar that is capable of holding 10 years’ worth of calendars inside its ample and skillfully designed scroll – making it easier than ever to visualize and plan long term goals.

Be prepared when the zombie apocalypse hits your town with this fully loaded zombie survival crate. With everything from a real machete and packaged Twinkies included in this kit, you’ll have everything you need to travel light while eliminating the local zombie threat.

Perform an effective and exhilarating workout without requiring a mountain of equipment by grabbing a hold of the KettlebellConnect smart kettlebell. This high-tech kettlebell allows you to effortlessly alter its weight between 12 and 43 pounds in under 3 seconds!

Here’s a crazy new way to spray champagne that makes it even more fun and with less mess! The Bubbly Blaster is made for durable high-quality aluminum and brass and attaches to any champagne bottle, turning it into a long-lasting champagne cannon!

It looks like beef, and it tastes like beef – but it ain’t beef! The plant-based “impossible burger” is here to change the way you think about veggie burgers. They taste great and require 95% less land, 74% less water, and 87% less greenhouse gas emissions to create.

This nifty Nintendo Game Boy watch is the ideal timepiece for the gamer in your life. This neat little digital watch is styled just like a miniature replica of the iconic portable gaming device – complete with a D-Pad, buttons, and a Super Mario Land themed alarm.

Ensure you’re ready for whatever Old Man Winter throws your way by suiting up in one of these Kelvin heated jackets. Each jacket is fitted with a rechargeable 5200 mAh Li-ion battery that provides power to 5 distinct warming zones that are scattered throughout the torso.

After 17 long years Toyota is bringing back the iconic Supra. Apart from its sleek updated design, the new Toyota GR Supra boasts a 3.0-liter twin-scroll turbocharged inline six with 335 horsepower, a 0 to 60 time of just 4.1 seconds, and a top speed of 155 mph.

Five minutes with the Super Anthony fighting robot and you’ll be hooked on the high-tech sport of robot fighting. This tough little guy comes with 15 steel-grade high-resolution IQ516HV servomotors capable of producing an impressive 99 pounds of punch force.

Ensure you never have to go far to refill your wine glass by placing this wine storage coffee table in your living room. This eye-catching piece comes with a built-in wine rack that is large enough to store up to 84 bottles of your favorite vino.

Transform your bathroom going experience by replacing your old school porcelain throne with the Kohler Numi 2.0 intelligent toilet. This imposing toilet comes with high-tech features like built-in speakers, ambient lighting, and a heated toilet seat for ultimate comfort.

If the mass produced Ikea styled furniture isn’t to your liking, feast your eyes on this gorgeous petrified wood coffee table! This prehistoric piece features rich hues of natural brown and black, is resistant to weathering, and is inlaid with Philippine Petrified Wood.

titleEN: The Simple Set Up Saltwater Aquarium
content: The simple set up saltwater aquarium takes all the hard work out of maintaining your very own aquarium. It provides you with simple instructions so that you can assemble a perfectly balanced saltwater ecosystem without having to invest of a lot of time on research.

Improvise, Adapt, and Overcome! The GY6 AR15 Survival Mag is the first and ONLY magazine to be combined with a Survival Kit. This unique survival mag holds 10 rounds of 5.56/.223 ammo, is 50 state legal, size of a 30 round mag, and contains a Survival Kit.

Get a front row seat to some of planet Earth’s most breathtaking vistas by spending some time inside one of these day trip egg cabins. These Norwegian cabins offer over 150 square feet along with a fireplace and cozy seating so you can take in the magnificent views nearby.

Cadillac has given us a glimpse at the future of electric SUVs with the unveiling of their EV Crossover. These next generation vehicles will be the new face of the upcoming lineup of electric vehicles which will be launching in the years to come.

Become the envy of every Imperial loyalist by adding this life size Stormtrooper statue to your collection. Modeled after the original trilogy Stormtroopers, this jaw-dropping statue stands at 6.5′ and is crafted from fiberglass, resin, and high quality plastic.

Cut down on clutter by replacing all your bulky grilling utensils with the Grill X multi-BBQ tool. This versatile tool’s unique design allows you to use it as either a knife, a grill fork, a spatula, a bottle opener, a razor sharp knife, barbecue tongs, or even a wine corkscrew.

With their eye on the future, Harley Davidson is entering the e-bike game with their LiveWire e-bike prototype. Instead of the classic v-twin engine, this eco-friendly ride will boast brushless DC motors and a simpler more lightweight design ideal for the concrete jungle.

Hang out with your favorite loud-mouthed merc anytime you want by adding this life size Deadpool replica statue to your collection. This masterfully crafted statue looks so real that you’ll think he’s jumped right out of the screen and into your home.

Kevin is the pocket-size self-defense handgun that is specially designed for close range use – making it a great option for everyday protection. This stealthy 0.38 handgun boasts a shooting range of 15 meters with a capacity for 7 rounds.

Transform your wall into a canvas for illumination using this one-of-a-kind touch sensitive modular lighting system. The system is composed of a series of plastic hexagons that you can interlock via magnets and activate individually with a tap of your finger.

Safe and efficient urban air travel may be coming to the masses sooner rather than later if the newly unveiled Nexus Flying Air Taxi is any indicator. Though still in its early stages, this hydro electric air taxi is projected to hit the skies by 2025.

The Runge RS is everything a late 1950s racer should be. This gorgeous ride features a curvaceous body design that pulls from the RSK and Spyder racers blended with Maserati and Ferrari styling cues to create an automobile that will turn heads wherever it goes.

Create a pleasant and inviting environment for bees to thrive and prosper in by installing these bee brick bee houses. These cleverly designed little bee houses feature a rustic and understated brick-like design that makes them ideal for virtually any backyard.

Give your dull meaningless life some joy with this giant inflatable Pickle Rick! This large inflatable comes plastered with Rick’s gorgeous mug, inflates in a snap, and stands approximately six feet tall, making this the perfect mascot for your next big party.

Aviar is the Russian company that’s ushering American muscle into the future with their R67 electric muscle car. This eco-friendly Mustang boasts all-wheel drive, a lightweight carbon fiber bodywork styled like the classic ’67 Mustang, and does 0-62 in just 2.2 seconds.

Whoever said fashion can’t be both functional and stunning clearly never laid their eyes on these human skin high heels. The visionaries at Fecal Matter behind these heels say they’re interned to make a statement about social media ideals and body modification.

titleEN: The World’s Most Advanced Charcoal Grill
content: Step up your grilling game by upgrading to the world’s most advanced charcoal grill. It features a unique design that provides unparalleled airflow control while also functioning as a slow cooker, smoker, and even an oven than can cook a pizza in just 2 minutes!

Welcome to the future of portable gaming! The Area-51 laptop from Alienware is the insanely powerful 17″ gaming laptop that will offer unmatched levels of customization – letting you replace, upgrade, and customize different components to your specifications.

Elon Musk’s The Boring Company is looking to cut down travel time with the Loop subterranean transport system. Cars would be lowered into a tunnel where a retractable wheel gear and rail system would safely propel them through underground tunnels at speeds of 150 mph.

This repurposed tuba bathroom sink takes music appreciation to an entirely new level. Reddit user marc_urzz shared this incredible this one-of-a-kind bathroom sink in his step-uncle’s bathroom that was made from an actual tuba!

Take your obsession to new and super comfy heights by immortalizing your furry friend with these personalized pet slippers. Simply submit a photo of your four legged family member and then receive a pair of comfortable, snuggly, and insanely cute sippers.

See what living in paradise is really like by booking a stay at this Maldives private island resort. This bucket-list-worthy tropical slice of heaven caters to your every whim to provide a truly unforgettable experience that you won’t ever want to end.

Take mealtime to another level by elevating your nutritional habits with Foodini – the 3D food printer. This high-tech kitchen accessory allows you to easily print your food into precise portions and shapes so that you can layer them to build edible 3D creations.

Exponentially increase your productivity when you upgrade your workstation with this massive 49″ ultra wide monitor from LG. Unveiled at CES, LG’s newst monitor features a 32:9 aspect ratio curved screen and a pixel count of 5120 x 1440.

Thanks to these personalized pet stuffed animals now you’ll be able to cuddle with your furry friend whenever you want – even if they’re physically not there. Simply send in a picture of your cuddly pet, and in a few weeks you’ll receive an adorable clone plushie of them.

Keep your collection of hooch organized, at hand, and out of sight by storing it inside this elegant sculptural polyhedron bar cart. This seemingly run-of-the-mill geometric polyhedron opens up to reveal a discreet bar cart with ample room for all your needs.

Stop overpaying for brand name watches at the mall! Watch Gang delivers a premium watch every month that’s yours to keep! All watches are high quality and are guaranteed to be up to five times more than the membership fees.

Liven up your coffee breaks with a little interdimensional twist by sipping your coffee, your juice, or your sweet booze from this Rick Sanchez 3D mug! This tall ceramic mug is styled and expertly hand-painted to look like a spitting image of Rick C-137.

Ditch those annoying headphones once and for all by upgrading to these Bose built-in speaker sunglasses. These stylish shades feature an open ear design and come fitted with miniaturized Bose speakers that direct the sound towards you and away from everyone else.

This window washing drone from Aerones aims to revolutionize how skyscraper windows are cleaned. This high-tech window washer will efficiently and securely clean the windows of any building in an extremely efficient and quick manner.

This futuristic walking car concept from Hyundai looks like it was conjured up in a galaxy far, far away. Resembling the Empire’s AT-AT Walkers, this vehicle comes with four height-adjustable legs perfect for getting around ultra rugged and uneven terrain.

In order to help passengers endure the hardships of holiday travel, Popeyes began offering these hilarious emotional support chicken takeout boxes. Now instead of having to settle for airline food, you can stuff your mouth with some of Popeyes delicious chicken!

The Rivian R1S is the rugged electric SUV which proves that eco-friendly e-cars aren’t just for paved city roads. It can go for over 400 miles on a single charge and comes outfitted with a powerful quad-motor system that will tackle any trail and does 0-60 in just 3 seconds!

Keep the excursion going long after the sun sets with the Kogalla Ra adventure light. As bright as 5 high-quality headlamps, the design allows for ultra-wide light dispersion and also straps onto your torso for convenient hands-free use.

Turn heads while driving by getting behind the wheel of one of these gorgeous Ford licensed first generation Broncos. The car maintains the timeless look and style of the 1970s and can be customized with everything from independent front suspensions to twin-turbos.

Own a piece of aviation history by acquiring the Thunderstreak ejection seat chair. This ultra rare piece was taken from a 1956 Republic F-84F Thunderstreak and has been reupholstered and outfitted with legs to transform it into a one-of-a-kind chair.

The BeerShark is key-chain-sized, multi-function beer opener that acts as a shotgunning tool, bottle opener, vent tool for better flow, as well as a tab puller. It is made in the USA and is available in a variety of vibrant color options.

The M1 Maverick bifold wallet is the rugged wallet designed specifically for your active and adventurous lifestyle. This vertical wallet boasts a water-resistant, flexible, and very resilient exterior in addition to a carbon multi-tool with over 10 functions.

Settle scores the old fashioned way with the inflatable jousting bopper game. You’ll get to bring out your inner American Gladiator as you try to knock your opponent off of their circular platform with nothing more than your trusty inflatable joust.

Ensure your property is monitored around the clock by outfitting your humble abode with the Deep Sentinel artificial intelligence security system. This revolutionary system combines A.I. with human intervention to help prevent break-ins before they occur.

Enjoy a hearty bowl of warm soup without slaving over a hot stove all day by signing up for this soup delivery service. You’ll be able to choose from delicious varieties like tomato basil, chicken noodle, cheddar broccoli, and a mouth-watering corn and potato chowder.

For luxury car collectors, there’s no better place to store and show off your insane rides than in the Collection Suites. This Miami based locale offers 38 massive suites with ample display space in addition to a bathroom, closet, wet bar, and a small loft ideal for hanging out in.

Unruly Bastards is the incredibly fun party game that encourages you to push the boundaries of inappropriateness just for the sake of winning. Players act out a series of rude and inappropriate situations as a character while the judge determines the winner.

Make your little intergalactic smuggler’s day at Disney even more magical by renting this Millennium Falcon stroller. Modeled after the iconic spaceship, this out-of-this-world ride is designed to accommodate up to two pint-sized passengers.

Put your love of Disney on display for all to see by creating some charming ambient lighting using this Mickey through the years lamp. The fun design depicts all the different variations of the iconic mouse throughout the ages.

The Lilium personal jet aircraft is the world’s first electric vertical landing and takeoff jet. It has a fully computer assisted control system for easy piloting and comes with a 435 HP motor that can reach speeds of up to 250 MPH with a range of 300 miles.

Keep an ace up your sleeve in the event you run into trouble by accessorizing with the Pring self-defense ring. This discreet and fashionable accessory features a durable stainless steel construction and is accented with a metallic spike that can be used to deter an attacker.

Walking is overrated. Give your tired legs a rest by transporting yourself on this laptop shaped skateboard. This futuristic looking ride is extremely lightweight and small enough to fit in a messenger bag or backpack, and it can also go for up to 7 miles on a single charge.

Rick’s at it again, and this time he’s turned himself into a pair of awesome Pickle Rick socks guaranteed to get you noticed wherever you go. These one-size-fits-all crew socks feature a zany design that’ll add style and humor to any outfit.

Experience a winter wonderland by booking a stay at the Swedish Ice Hotel! Located in Sweden’s Northern Lights region, it offers spectacular winter vistas and features masterfully sculpted rooms made entirely of ice from the nearby Thorne River.
